## GeneralActionContext interface

Context object provided to general action handlers that are not tied to a specific row. [ActionContextBase](./list-display.actioncontextbase.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface GeneralActionContext<TRow = any, TRowId = string | number> extends ActionContextBase<TRow, TRowId> 
```
**Extends:** [ActionContextBase](./list-display.actioncontextbase.md)<!-- -->&lt;TRow, TRowId&gt;
